rules.name: OM Snapshot Sync Interval
rules.message: OM snapshot sync interval outside recommended range
rules.recommendation: Set ozone.recon.om.snapshot.task.interval to 10m for balanced freshness
rules.impact: Too short: excessive load on OM. Too long: stale Recon data

rules.name: Database Connection Pool
rules.message: Database connection pool size outside recommended range
rules.impact: Too few: slow queries. Too many: resource waste

rules.name: HTTP Server Thread Count
rules.message: HTTP server thread count outside recommended range
rules.impact: Too few: slow API responses. Too many: resource contention

rules.name: Container Health Task Interval
rules.message: Container health check interval outside typical range
rules.impact: Affects how quickly Recon detects unhealthy containers
